Name: The Salty Bird
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
8 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Salty Bird hardly suggests a sweet fruity drink but perfectly befits this bittersweet rum-laced pineapple sipper.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Lauren Schell at The Everleigh in Melbourne, Australia and promoted by Campari in 2013.
Nutrition: One serving of The Salty Bird contains 197 calories
